item.description:
Hi Everyone,

I have added a second meetup this month, since our usual is full. If you have signed on for the meetup this Saturday, please stay signed on. For those who could not sign on for it, I have added Saturday, June 20th at 10am to the line-up.

For this meet-up, Kristin from Curly Tail Pug Rescue will be here selling raffle tickets for $1 each. These tickets are for the upcoming movie "Valentino". For those not attending the meetup, you can view the raffle at http://www.curlytailp...

IN ADDITION: Producers from Dogs101 on Animal Planet will be in filming and interviewing members for their upcoming season. SPACE IS LIMITED.


As always, Thanks a million

Rob
item.name: 2nd Pug Meetup
